title: Modernization & Integration
intro: Integrating legacy platforms with cloud-native architectures while preserving mission continuity.

items.title: Cloud Migration
items.body: Safely migrate workloads to cloud platforms with minimal downtime and risk.

items.title: API & Integration Architecture
items.body: Design and implement integration layers connecting disparate systems into cohesive ecosystems.

items.title: Data Modernization
items.body: Modernize data pipelines, warehousing, and analytics for real-time insights and decision-making.
